casebody.data:
State
v.
Charles Everette Hinton 449P11-13 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

Charles E. Hinton, Pro Se.

Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of February 2016 by Petitioner for Calendaring Cause

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
